item.title: Limits
item.description: Lord, I was awoken from a dark dream to the smell of Chai tea and whispers… Aurora and Elanor getting up to pray. After the dream, this was a welcome reality. I am running up against my limits as regards self-discipline, it seems. My desire to get up early and run, exercise, etc. is utterly gone. I know running later will be more challenging, but I can’t make myself do it.

item.title: Learning To Pray
Here I Go Again
item.description: Lord, I want to be closer to you. Here is my attempt to talk with you more regularly. Bless it, and help me in this endeavor. New post/Git Commands Generate new post file in ~/blog/prayerblog/: hugo newposts/NameOfPost.md Copy path of newly created post in ~/prayerblog/content/posts/ cd content/posts/ code . PATH/TO/POST Write post in VSCode, Save In terminal, cd to ~/blog/prayerblog/ Check local changes: hugo server In browser, navigate to localhost:1313 and confirm additions/changes
